mapper.select: SELECT tdt.id AS type_id, tdt.type_name, GROUP_CONCAT(twad.doc_path ORDER BY twad.id SEPARATOR ',') AS doc_path FROM ted_worker_apply_document twad LEFT JOIN ted_document_type tdt ON twad.type_id = tdt.id AND tdt.is_deleted = 0 ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY tdt.id, tdt.type_name ORDER BY tdt.id ASC;
